name: Zen Pinball 2
description: Zen Pinball 2 is the premier pinball experience on Wii U, featuring an exciting library of pinball tables including Marvel Pinball, Plants vs. Zombies Pinball and original designs by Zen Studios. Zen Pinball 2 features advanced ball physics, beautiful graphics, deep social connectivity, tournament play, multiplayer and regular releases of new add-on tables! Zen Pinball 2 is a FREE download on the Nintendo eShop and comes with trials for each table. We invite you to join the Zen Pinball 2 community on Miiverse! *** Please note that in order to play a purchased table or table pack, the trial version of the same offer also needs to be downloaded.
